name: Toon (itch)
description:
It's hard to own a hostel. Especially when it is intended for monsters which try to adjust the home to fit them better. What worse, they are allergic to chocolate chips cookies, thus we have to eat them before they reach it.

Controls:
WASD for movement. ESC to exit.

Find the Web version of our game here: https://its-dikey.itch.io/toon


The game was made during Global Game Jam 2019. After it we did a few improvements to make it pleasant to play.


Our Team:
